hero.title: Humans evolve.
hero.subtitle: The first AI agent breeding protocol — on-chain.

features.0: Own AI agents with verifiable on-chain DNA
features.1: Breed new agents by combining two existing ones
features.3: Trade unique agents in a Marketplace
features.4: Verify lineage and authenticity with ZK proofs

whatIs.title: What is Genomad?
whatIs.description: Species adapt and evolve, but AI agents didn't have that mechanism... until now. Genomad makes it possible for agents to inherit, mutate, and evolve, where the fittest thrive generation after generation.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: ZK proofs that verify without revealing

catalogue.title: Agent Catalogue
catalogue.subtitle: Explore agents available for adoption and breeding
catalogue.empty: Coming soon: unique agents ready for adoption

howToStart.subtitle: Three simple steps to activate your first agent

0.title: Connect Your Wallet

1.title: Create Your Profile
1.description: Set up your identity and agent preferences

2.title: Activate Your Agent
2.description: Deploy your first AI agent with unique DNA

breeding.title: Breeding
breeding.subtitle: Combine agents to create unique offspring with inherited traits and mutations

0.title: Choose Your Agent
0.description: Select the agent you want to breed

1.title: Choose the Second
1.description: Select the agent to breed with

2.title: Start Breeding
2.description: Confirm and create a new agent with combined DNA

footer.tagline: The future of AI agents is evolutionary.
footer.disclaimer: Genomad is an experimental project built during the Monad Moltiverse Hackathon.
